titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 127 Social Street in Woonsocket, Rhode Island, as the "Alphonse F. Auclair Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

bill.summary: 10/2/2000--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 127 Social Street in Woonsocket, Rhode Island, as the Alphonse F. Auclair Post Office Building.
